Room.Name: Draknal's Forge
Room.ShortDescription: You are in Draknal's forge room, an intensely hot chamber.
Room.LongDescription: Nearby in a huge hearth a blue white fire gives off an incredible amount of heat. Three anvils, each a different size stand in the middle of the room. Several pieces of armor are in various stages of assembly in the forge, and a two-handed sword lies on a nearby table. Looking to the east, you see the chamber of Draknal, the Death Knight.
